lead_paragraph: Dec 21 (Reuters) – South Africa captain Faf du Plessis has lost his appeal against a ball-tampering conviction, but will be free to play in the first test against Sri Lanka starting on Boxing Day.

headline.print_headline: Du Plessis Loses Appeal Against Ball-Tampering Conviction
headline.main: Du Plessis Loses Appeal Against Ball-Tampering Conviction
